item.title: Grilled Vegetable Quinoa Salad
item.description: This Grilled Vegetable Quinoa Salad is a vibrant and nutritious dish that combines the earthy flavors of grilled vegetables with the nutty taste of quinoa. Perfect for a light lunch or as a side dish, it's both satisfying and refreshing.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 20 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 35 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 200g quinoa
  • 1 zucchini, diced
  • 1 bell pepper, diced
  • 1 eggplant, diced
  • 100g chickpeas, cooked
  • Juice of 1 lemon
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • Fresh mint leaves, chopped

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Cook the quinoa according to package instructions until fluffy.
  2. Grill the diced zucchini, bell pepper, and eggplant until tender and slightly charred.
  3. In a large bowl, combine the cooked quinoa, grilled vegetables, and chickpeas.
  4. Drizzle with lemon juice and olive oil, then toss gently to combine.
  5. Garnish with fresh mint before serving.
